property.name: uuid
property.value: replace(concat('test02_v01_', substring(cast(now() as text), 1, 10), '_', substring(cast(uuid_generate_v4() as text), 1, 13)), '-', '_')

changeSet.author: slawomir.bankowski
changeSet.sql: CREATE or replace FUNCTION generate_uid(table_code text) RETURNS text as $func$ BEGIN RETURN replace(concat(table_code, '_', cast(nextval('seq_id') as text), '_', substring(cast(now() as text), 1, 10), '_', substring(cast(uuid_generate_v4() as text), 1, 13), ''), '-', '_'); END $func$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;
